programme.title: Rare Survivors - China's Iconic Wildlife (S1)
programme.desc: Mist swirls around the base of Shanghai's skyline. From the city, tigers and monkeys seem as unreal and distant as dragons and mermaids emerging through the mist. Yet they exist as rare survivors in an extraordinary and diverse landscape. From snow leopards to wild horses, and from alligators to elephants, China's iconic wildlife is a lot more than just pandas.

programme.title: Wild City: Forest Life (S1)
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough narrates the award-winning Wild City series that explores the wild side of Singapore. Here on the fringes of the city, the jungle harbours some fascinating species, including many that have never been filmed before. The star of the show is the Raffles' banded langur, one of the least-known primates on the planet. Found only in Singapore and Malaysia, there are only a few hundred left and around 60 have made a home in Singapore's rainforests.

programme.title: 鬼名模 / Model from Hell
programme.desc: 模特儿学员嘉莉成绩突出，引起其他同学的妒忌，甚至要伤害她，但他们结果都会离奇死亡。原来每当嘉莉气愤时，身体会出现一种恐怖的变化，更会使出致人死地的魔法….

programme.title: 黑白道 / On the Edge
programme.desc: 海生在黑道做卧底八年，当他抓获犯罪集团主脑后，终于摆脱卧底身份，如愿以偿回到警队。然而，他却发现一切远非想象般美好，因为他都不被同事信任，连深爱的女友也选择离开他，甚至被黑道追杀。.

programme.title: 女人本色 / Wonder Women
programme.desc: 故事描述从1997年回归到2007年的十年间，一位女强人与好友一同随着香港经济的起起落落，凭着自强不息、坚毅不屈的精神，一一面对人生不同的高低起伏。.

programme.title: 花心大少 / Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: 严钱声是一名自恃追女高手的富家花花公子，被母亲劝喻要成家立室。他在寻找生命中的女主角时，被两个追女高手挑战。到底他最后能否找到心中最爱?

programme.title: 鬼眼刑警 / Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: 警员姚七星拥有能看得见鬼魂的技能，这是由他家族一代遗传到下一代的。当他在枪战中把绑匪杀人王击毙杀死后，王击毙变成厉鬼报仇，这时姚七星要学懂如何控制他的天赋技能以对抗厉鬼。.

programme.title: 情迷大话王 / Everyday Is Valentine
programme.desc: OK是赖以说谎为生的骗子。一天他遇上梦中情人Wonderful，为了博取她的芳心，他假扮成为一名富豪。然而，Wonderful曾起誓，永远不会爱上说谎的男人。OK最后能否不再说谎，并赢得Wonderful的芳心？.

programme.title: 靓女差馆 / Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: 雷女警长率领的港岛东刑事侦缉组的组员全是女警，因此有「靓女差馆」之称。警员生啤和沙爹对各女警一见难忘，遂主动申请调职到靓女差馆，意图接近众女并展开追求。这时，靓女差馆收到炸弹恐吓，她们最后能化解危机吗？.

programme.title: 师兄撞鬼 / Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: 该片描述董骠调查制造毒品案，却惨死在毒贩枪下。董骠化做鬼魂回警察局，借警员周星驰之手查清杀己的凶手。冯淬帆和周星驰在茅山老祖的指导下利用灵药合力斗败邪恶法师，枪毙邓公子，为董骠报了仇，使他能安心上天堂。.

programme.title: 花田囍事 / All's Well End's Well Too
programme.desc: 此片乃著名喜剧导演高志森的作品。故事发生在北宋年间，各主角经历了重重误会险阻，闹出多段错综杂、一塌糊涂的冤家情缘，过程荒唐惹笑，却又情味浓。.

programme.title: 法内情 / The Truth
programme.desc: 律师刘志鹏在孤儿院长大，曾为被控谋杀的妓女刘惠兰打赢官司，但他却不知兰原来是自己的母亲。当一名黑警知道二人关系后，勒索兰巨款，兰在走投无路之下杀死黑警。刘志鹏再次为兰辩护，亦发现兰保守多年的秘密。.

programme.title: 神话 / The Myth
programme.desc: 考古学家杰克与科学家威廉偶然发现古代秦朝文物，他们更被带到陵墓，回到杰克上一世当中国古代战士的时候，展开了一段传奇的神话。.

programme.title: 夜半歌声 / The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: 1926年的中国，才华横溢的歌手宋丹平与纯真的富家少女杜云嫣深陷爱河。然而，这段感情遭到云嫣父亲的强烈反对，并引发她家为她所选的未婚夫的嫉妒。这是一个关于歌手与富家女在传统社会中共同追寻爱情的故事。.

programme.title: 卧虎 / Wo Hu
programme.desc: 为打击香港最大的犯罪集团，警方安插了千多名卧底渗透各黑社会组织。这群黑帮兄弟要面对兄弟背叛，尔虞我诈，互相残杀，同时也要与执法者正面交锋，更要与兄弟斗过你死我活！.

programme.title: 法中情 / Law Or Justice
programme.desc: 摄影师田迪文强奸模特儿凌祖儿，幸得大律师叶颖文洗脱控罪。颖文男友高级督察方伟负责此案，不满女友是非不分。祖儿之妹凌珊珊替姐报仇，反遭田施暴，颖文再任其辩护律师。珊珊因过往不良纪录，处处失利，能够令田入罪的机会极微；检控官决定请师兄龙约翰出山相助。.

programme.title: 法中情 / Law Or Justice
programme.desc: 摄影师田迪文强奸模特儿凌祖儿，幸得大律师叶颖文洗脱控罪。颖文男友高级督察方伟负责此案，不满女友是非不分。祖儿之妹凌珊珊替姐报仇，反遭田施暴，颖文再任其辩护律师。珊珊因过往不良纪录，处处失利，能够令田入罪的机会极微；检控官决定请师兄龙约翰出山相助。.

programme.title: 安娜与武林 / Anna in Kungfu-Land
programme.desc: 广告从业员阿健为客户的宣传活动举办「武林大会」，他远赴日本邀请少林传人石安娜参赛，结果更吸引八大门派的奇人踊跃参加。随着武林大会迫在眉睫，两人不知不觉间亦擦出爱火花...
周慕云不断遇上不同的女人，但经历过情感的创伤使他的心变得麻木。在一次偶然的巧遇后，他开始动笔撰写一部名为《2046》的小说：「2046」这个地方，所有的事物都不会改变，每个人去「2046」都只有一个目的，就是找回他们失去的回忆。.

programme.title: 七小福 / Painted Faces
programme.desc: 本片是改编自京剧大师于占元师傅的真实故事。六十年代戏剧文化日渐衰落，但于师傅仍坚持要保留他的戏剧学院。三个少年决意入读于师傅的戏剧研究学院，向他拜师学艺，经过艰辛的训练过程后，于师傅终于成功造就香港影坛这三大巨星。.

programme.title: 摩登仙履奇缘 / Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: 陈七是职业惯匪，偷呃拐骗无所不为，但从不使用暴力；张曼珠是电视台新晋演员，收入微薄，生活拮据。一次偶然中，陈得到了一枚巨钻，欲找买家脱手，却遇杀手追杀，情急下将巨钻藏于某鞋店的一只高跟鞋内，后来，此鞋刚好被张买去参加舞会…….

programme.title: 赤脚小子 / The Bare-footed Kid
programme.desc: 穷乡青年关丰曜，终日赤着双脚，以背人过河为活。关父临终前，嘱其出城投靠段青云；段骤见故人之子，留下关在布店当小工。关与私塾女教师华小莲交心，却遭莲父白眼；关为求出人头地，竟往投靠土霸喀和布，结果连累莲父与段相继被喀暗算身亡。关得知真相，惜为时已晚，追悔莫及，决与喀拼过死活...

programme.title: 回魂夜 / Out of the Dark
programme.desc: 老妇神秘堕楼死亡，鬼魂于回魂夜当晚出现作祟。弄得一众大厦保安员不得安宁，并邀请了捉鬼大师Leo与女助手相助。Leo从老妇鬼魂得知，她是被儿子及媳妇所杀害，为了让老妇安息，Leo答应将夫妇二人绳之以法...

programme.title: 神勇双妹唛 / Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: 故事描述一对表姐妹梁山伯与祝英台乃斗气冤家，两女为争夺神秘俊男阿山欢心，却惹来大圈杀手威吓逼害，更陷入一场宝物争夺战。两女身陷险境，惟有摒弃前嫌，连手反抗…….

programme.title: 鬼马飞人 / The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: 阿B为一名中学的体育教师，其执教之学校篮、足球队成绩甚差，学校下令他务必赢得校际比赛冠军，否则将撤换教练。阿B因头痛，误服同事研制之神药，变成超人，令球队屡次创造奇迹...

programme.title: 门徒 / Protege
programme.desc: 警员卧底阿力为要搜集贩毒罪证，用了八年时间混到毒臬昆哥身旁，最终获得昆哥的信任，成为他的门徒。当昆哥要退休时，阿力继承了昆哥的庄家位置，一边当毒贩、一边继续追踪贩毒线的源头。两者之间，他已分不清自己真正的身份。.

programme.title: 宝贝计划 / Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: 城中著名的「盗贼三人组」受聘以三千万元绑架一名婴孩。当他们发现黑帮要夺取其赎金，还要追杀婴孩后，三人组决定要把婴孩变为他们的门徒。一方面逃避警方的追捕，另一方面要躲避黑帮的追杀，三人即使危险重重，仍决意要确保婴孩可安全回家。.

programme.title: 森寃 / Forest of Death
programme.desc: 电影是跟据一个日本传说改编。故事讲述一群年轻人聚在一起执行特殊任务，研究调查一处森林如何发出神秘讯号，从而诱人入内自杀。.

programme.title: 神枪手与智多星 / Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: 九年前，两个传奇人物“神枪手”和“智多星”发誓不再开枪杀人和永不再说谎。现在，他们却为同一个目的回来 — 保护江湖老大的孙女儿小雨。最终他们能否信守承诺完成任务？.

programme.title: 赌侠2002 / Conman 2002, The
programme.desc: 「地狱倒霉鬼」李加乘头头碰着黑，幸得高人指点，自他搬迁祖坟改运后，在赌场上逢赌必胜。其后对头人得知其秘密后，对李之祖坟加以破坏。在赌局决赛中，李加乘能否赢得赌局？.

programme.title: 打雀英雄传 / Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: 足智多谋的麻雀英雄，为避免年轻计算机专家的麻雀馆落入麻雀千王手上，不惜重新出山与千王鏖战。.

programme.title: 打雀英雄传 / Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: 足智多谋的麻雀英雄，为避免年轻计算机专家的麻雀馆落入麻雀千王手上，不惜重新出山与千王鏖战。.

programme.title: 非法移民 / The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: 改编自真实个案，交织着年青偷渡客的友谊、爱情与理想的梦。青年张君秋偷渡纽约，一方面要筹钱还给偷渡集团，另一方面希望通过假结婚获得居留权，故不断找寻假结婚对象。.

programme.title: 风流冤鬼 / Sex Beyond The Grave
programme.desc: 红歌女阿花遭大户陶老爷奸杀，陶宅即常闹鬼，后陶老爷亦神秘死亡。陶之后人陶明嗜赌如命，更因鬼魂作怪而欠下巨款。明妻暗中将陶宅售予杨教授夫妇，即遇上怪事连篇...

programme.title: 洪福齐天 / The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: 洪金宝在片中饰演三个角色：分别为肥仔洪，肥仔洪的父亲及爷爷。酒店员工肥仔洪梦想发达，不听从父亲的教悔，与朋友小海往赌场一博，期望一朝致富。当肥仔洪跌至人生谷底时，肥仔洪爷爷的鬼魂出现帮助他脱离困境。而肥仔洪发现爷爷原来是被谋杀后，决定誓要为他报仇。.

programme.title: 炮制女朋友 / My Dream Girl
programme.desc: 富商张天出国发展五年，回国后在贫民区中找到了失散许久的女儿张宁。为要让女儿由一位粗鲁肮脏的女孩变成一名淑女，张天聘请了形象设计师祖林替她改头换面。.

programme.title: 提防老千 / Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: 恒仔因亏空公款入狱，狱中遇上老千十四哥。十四哥也把千术及赌术传授予恒仔。出狱后，他们与十四哥的情人罗拉连手，准备向陷害十四哥入狱的仇人龙王报复。岂料，恒仔受不了罗拉的诱惑，竟与她搭上。恒仔是否会放弃与十四哥一起向龙王进行报复？.

programme.title: 重庆森林 / Chungking Express
programme.desc: 两段发生于香港的都市爱情故事，两位在情场失意的警察，各自遇到闯进他们生活的女性：神秘的女通缉犯和俏皮的快餐店女店员。.

programme.title: 反收数特遣队 / Shark Busters
programme.desc: 高级警司李Sir因欠下卡数四十万元，被传媒大肆报导，更因而被警察内务部调查。李Sir的下属亦各因欠债问题受到骚扰，李Sir决定部署地下部队对付贵利集团...

programme.title: 呖咕呖咕新年财 / Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: 麻雀大侠德华甚受街坊欢迎，但受前女友诅咒后，却每次也只有烂牌。他最终能躲开一连串的霉运吗？.

programme.title: 功夫灌篮 / Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: 少年世杰从小在功夫学校长大并拥有异于常人的百发百中神技。在街头流浪的陈立看准世杰的神技，安排他加入大学篮球队参赛。世杰施展中国功夫赢尽所有大学篮球赛，不单赚取了财富，更与陈立建立了深厚的感情。.

programme.title: 百年好合 / Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: 峨嵋代理掌门灭绝医好富豪花花公子洪飞虎的不冶之症。因受师姐的威胁，灭绝必须要学懂「伤心断肠剑」以打败她及保住峨嵋，但学剑前要先尝伤心欲绝的滋味。于是，灭绝寻求飞虎的帮助。这段兜兜转转的特殊关系最后能否百年好合？.

programme.title: 见鬼 / The Eye
programme.desc: 年轻女孩汶为治疗眼盲，接受了眼角膜移植，意想不到的是汶获得的不仅是视力，还有异象。更甚的是，汶吓然发觉自己一直在镜中看见的反映原来是另有其人。汶自然想到自从换上眼角膜以后事情才随着变化，誓要找出事情的真相….

programme.title: 旺角的天空3终极边缘 / Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: 街头少年阿东一直视旺角黑社会头目蒲俊为偶像，后来更意外地成为蒲俊手下。对头人西洋仔用卑鄙手段当上了社团的龙头老大，于是蒲俊决定要对付他。同时，蒲俊又发现身边的阿东竟是警方派来的卧底，于是立刻赶走了阿东。然而，阿东竟放弃其警察身份，与蒲俊连手作战。.

programme.title: 一千零一夜之梦中人 / Dream Lover
programme.desc: 一日，嘉成邂逅琪琪，二人一见钟情，可惜琪琪突然不知所踪。数年后，嘉成重遇琪琪，可是她已为人妇。嘉成为解心灵的慰藉，终于求得特异功能大师的帮助，使之沉醉于个人的绮梦中，好与琪琪终日相对，奈何她只能成为嘉成的梦中情人….

programme.title: 九星报喜 / Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: 这部拥有众多电影红星主演的知名喜剧，讲述了一名地方法官及其兄弟们试图将罪恶引入彩虹村这个善良小区的故事。当他们同时为村中一位迷人的年轻姑娘竞相争宠时，兄弟间的冲突不断升温，导致他们的恶行也变得错综复杂。.

programme.title: 见鬼2 / The Eye 2
programme.desc: 失恋的嘉文自杀未遂，正打算重新开始却发现自己怀孕，但不敢告诉前男友。嘉文同时亦发觉常被一个神秘女人跟踪，更不断遇见各种恐怖幻象，精神面临崩溃。幸得一寺院主持指点，嘉文为了胎儿决定消除心魔，找出真相….

programme.title: 见鬼2 / The Eye 2
programme.desc: 失恋的嘉文自杀未遂，正打算重新开始却发现自己怀孕，但不敢告诉前男友。嘉文同时亦发觉常被一个神秘女人跟踪，更不断遇见各种恐怖幻象，精神面临崩溃。幸得一寺院主持指点，嘉文为了胎儿决定消除心魔，找出真相….

programme.title: 男与女 / Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: 偷渡客孟思晨匿居于山边木屋区，沦为众男工具，期间结识非法拳师江远生，并发生雾水情缘。后来思晨下嫁中年木匠贵叔，生活虽安稳，心灵却空虚。意外再遇远生后，难免干柴烈火，未几更有孕...

programme.title: 金玉满堂 / The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: 赵港生希望以厨师身份在加拿大展开新生活，于是前往满汉楼向欧兆丰学习厨艺。他将代表满汉楼参加满汉全席比赛，然而，由于厨艺尚未成熟，只能向一位厨神求助，以应对这场终极挑战。.

programme.title: 雀圣2 / Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: 细芬表面上是一个普通的家庭主妇，但其实是个麻雀高手。她深爱着丈夫子雄，但子雄却为了波波决定跟细芬离婚，而细芬也在麻雀台上输给了波波。在得到麻雀师傅的教导后，细芬誓要在雀神大赛上再战波波！.

programme.title: 爱的世界 / The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: 李子良丧妻后，与两个儿子相依为命。妻子的巨额医药费令子良经济十分拮据，受同事教唆往马场孤注一掷，迫得向高利贷借款，从此子良债台高筑，疲于奔命，没有时间与儿子沟通，父子疏离。与此同时高利贷不断登门恐吓，骚扰儿子，最终弄至悲剧发生….

programme.title: 十万火急 / Lifeline
programme.desc: 这是关于香港消防员的英勇救火故事。勇敢的消防员无惧冲天大火，肩负救灾扶危的重任，甚至舍身救人。但当消防员脱下制服后，是否仍同样勇敢地面对自身的难题呢？.

programme.title: 见鬼10 / The Eye 10
programme.desc: 这是「见鬼」恐怖电影系列的第三部曲。故事讲述一群青年在泰国度假时，根据一本神秘漫画当中记载的十个见鬼方法，试着与灵魂沟通的怪异经历。.

programme.title: 见习黑玫瑰 / Protégé de la Rose Noire
programme.desc: 传奇女侠黑玫瑰找来两个年轻女孩 Gill和 Sandy作为她的继承人。二人都是勇敢正义的女孩，黑玫瑰训练他们，让他们可以建立扑灭罪案的新势力，成为新一代的黑玫瑰！.

programme.title: 非常突然 / Expect The Unexpected
programme.desc: 重案组追查三名毛贼抢劫金铺时，偶然发现被通缉多时的悍匪，于是同时追捕两帮匪徒。经过一轮激战，悍匪被他们一网打尽。当他们为此庆祝时，却碰上溜走的毛贼，事情顿时变得非常突然。.

programme.title: 珠光宝气 / Whatever You Want
programme.desc: 一名商人的私生女，无意中擦出神仙阿宝，并得到三个愿望。可惜阿宝法术不精，而发生了很多啼笑皆非的事。.

programme.title: 文雀 / The Sparrow
programme.desc: 棋是个经验老到的"文雀"，一位喜爱拍摄身边人和事的扒手。一天，神秘而美丽的珍妮被摄入镜头，棋被她深深吸引。珍妮的惊艳把棋迷倒，但原来她背后藏着神秘的过去和一个秘密的任务….

programme.title: 我的野蛮同学 / My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: 在一间Band5学校有个打擂台的传统，学生会在课室将很多张书桌拼成一个擂台，在擂台上进行决胜去解决一切争执。四个性格各异的少年石头、Edward、亚凤、Seven意外地成为朋友，共同经历了难忘的成长体验...

programme.title: 古宅心慌慌 / Death Curse, The
programme.desc: 医学家丁济怀欲把遗产分给八位由不同妻子所生的子女，他们为了得到这笔巨大的遗产而聚首于父亲的恐怖古宅中。由张律师监督，八位兄弟姐妹必须每天半夜在古宅中聚集祈祷，否则将失去继承权。.

programme.title: 审死官 / Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: 周星驰饰演著名状师宋世杰，经常不择手段为富人打赢官司，让他们逍遥法外，因此妻子迫使他退隐乡间。然而，当宋夫人结识一位丈夫之死被贪官掩盖的妇人时，宋世杰决定挺身而出，再次在公堂上伸张正义，为她讨回公道。.

programme.title: 大富之家 / It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: 香港富翁任大宽一家四代同堂，但三个儿子却各有烦恼。一天，留学法国的女儿与朋友Roberto一起回港，Roberto的出现为任大宽一家带来连串的变化，点燃了全家新的希望与机遇。.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
Headline News
programme.desc: The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: East Asia Tonight
programme.desc: Spotlight on East Asia, a region steeped in history and now helping to write the future of our world. We'll break down the key stories and explain why they matter.

programme.title: How Graphic!

programme.desc: After a man is gunned down at an after-hours club, investigators and the prosecutor are left with no witnesses willing to provide testimony, leaving the case hanging on the defendant's self-defence claim.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Tim and Barbara Pasa meet at a gig Tim is performing at and quickly fall for one another. Barbara is a surgical nurse by day, a fun-loving party animal. They marry quickly, shocking their friends.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: With the help of digital forensics, authorities are able to debunk the alibi of one of the last people to see a 24-year-old missing jogger in rural Arkansas, making him the primary suspect in her murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: The Rifkin Murders
programme.desc: Joel Rifkin took the lives of 17 women in New York. Almost thirty years later, a TV producer leverages his relationship with New York's most prolific serial killer to get information police could use.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S5)
programme.desc: In the chaos after a car crash, a veteran shoots out the tire of another driver's vehicle. Now he is facing up to 20 years in prison. Will a jury decide his actions were justified or reckless?

programme.desc: Tulsa detectives believe the victim of a shooting was a Good Samaritan who'd been robbed. But at trial, the jury must decide if his killer actually acted in fear of his own life.

programme.desc: Wayne's digital use has led him down a destructive path of porn addiction and more. Carissa dreams of helping others through online connections, but she doesn't realize she needs to help herself first.

programme.desc: A woman in a volatile relationship is found dead in her car. Detectives suspect her boyfriend, but, at trial, he takes the stand to brazenly claim she was actually the victim of a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: The investigation focuses on a white guy with a white pickup truck. Ann Bryan is found murdered at the St. James Place retirement community. Despite attempts to catch her killer, the case goes cold.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Growing up gay in the hyper-masculine Bayou was tough on Ronald Dominique. An inability to connect and a prison sexual assault would cement his decision to ultimately kill his first victim.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6)
programme.desc: In December 2013, 25-year-old Josh Richards is gunned down in the Luna Lounge nightclub in Appleton, Wisconsin. Detectives find a camera which could potentially reveal a cold-blooded killer's identity.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6)
programme.desc: 24-year-old Yale PhD student Annie Le goes missing. CCTV shows her arriving at Yale, but she is not seen leaving. All evidence points to something happening to Annie inside.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Lakhvir Singh enjoyed cooking for Lucky Cheema, the man she loved. But when he left her to marry a much younger woman, Singh made the couple a meal that would turn out to be the last Lucky ever tasted.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2)
programme.desc: A writer goes on a holiday cruise with her husband to celebrate their first anniversary. After she goes missing, security footage shows her falling overboard, leaving everyone to wonder why.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: After a man is shot dead, pathologist Dr. Antoine Wrice works with investigators to interpret unusual evidence found on the scene and unwind the complex case that could be more than a typical homicide.

programme.title: Phrogging: Hider In My House
programme.desc: After Heidi Lane moves to the big city, her underwear starts vanishing. When Jordan Buranskas can't find her purse, her boyfriend plays back security footage and they see a phrogger creeping toward them.

programme.title: The Sting
programme.desc: Winner of seven Academy Awards®, The Sting is an intricate comedy caper about a small-time crook (Robert Redford) and a veteran con man (Paul Newman) who seek revenge on a crime lord.

programme.title: Angels \u0026 Demons
programme.desc: Robert Langdon tries to solve a murder and unravel a plot by an ancient group, the Illuminati, to blow up the Vatican during a papal conclave.

programme.title: Confidence
programme.desc: Jake Vig is a con man with a gift for duplicity and a natural charm. Now he’s cooked up the con of a lifetime to even the score for the murder of a buddy, pay back those he owes, and get the hell out of the business while he’s still drawing breath.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: A poor laborer father and his young son's lives are turned upside down when a fascinating and strange new pet enters their world. Amid the resulting comic mayhem, they ultimately learn a poignant lesson about the true nature of family and the things money can't buy.

programme.title: Cloudy With A Chance Of Meatballs
programme.desc: A scientist tries to solve world hunger only to see things go awry as food falls from the sky in abundance.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: A daring yet reckless pilot who shuns teamwork and the rules of engagement eventually learns the importance of cooperation and discipline. Along the way he has a fiery affair, does some spectacular flying and causes the death of his best friend.

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as Chuck Noland, a Federal Express efficiency expert, who is stranded on a remote island after his plane crashes. Forced to survive in isolation, he undertakes a journey of self-discovery that transforms him, both physically and emotionally.

programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then….

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap at ang paggamit ng balangkas sa pagpapakita ng nakalap na impormasyon. Matutuhan din dito kung paano magpahayag ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the concept of area and volume of triangles, parallelograms and trapezoids. These episodes also teach about bar graphs and simple experiments.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about writing short stories and journals. These episodes also talk about different sources of information.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang pang-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa kaniyang mga karapatan at tungkulin bilang mamamayang Filipino.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different types of soil, the different sources of water suitable for human consumption, components of weather using simple instruments, and the Sun as the main source of heat and light on Earth.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagpapahayag at pagsusulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, pagsusuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at paggawa ng dayagram.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about composing clear and coherent sentences and writing a persuasive essay.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Filipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the effects of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga elemento nito. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagpapahayag ng pansariling paniniwala at malikhaing pagsusulat.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of inequalities in a triangle, and parallel and perpendicular lines. These episodes also teach about the key concepts of probability.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the different sources of information and grammatical signals. These also talk about communicating skills and writing paragraphs.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa kahalagahan ng pakikipag- ugnayan at sama-samang pagkilos sa kontemporanyong daigdig tungo sa pandaigdigang kapayapaan, pagkakaisa, pagtutulungan, at kaunlaran.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the digestive system and its interaction with other body systems, the diseases that result from nutrient deficiency and ingestion of harmful substances. These episodes also talk about how cells divide to produce new cells, meiosis, the concept of species, and the one-way flow of energy and the cycling of materials in an ecosystem.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang akda at maikling kuwento na may kinalaman sa kulturang Asyano. Susuriin din dito ang mga tauhan, mahahalagang pangyayari, at kaisipan sa binasang akda.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of measures of position.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on writing research reports, giving definitions, and observing correct grammar.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kahalagahan ng pagkamamamayan at pakikilahok sa mga gawaing pansibiko tungo sa pagkakaroon ng pamayanan at bansang maunlad, mapayapa, at may pagkakaisa.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about how gases behave based on the motion and relative distances between gas particles, the structure of biomolecules. These episodes also explain the chemical reactions associated with biological and industrial processes affecting life and the environment.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of plaing, setting up, and ruing a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of plaing, setting up, and ruing a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagbibigay ng mga mahalagang pangyayari, paksa, at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggan o nabasang teksto. Matutuhan din dito ang wastong pagbaybay sa mga salita at paglalarawan ng tagpuan at tauhan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about area, volume, and temperature. These episodes also explain line graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on analyzing visual and multimedia elements and writing paragraphs and articles.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay pag-uusapan ang bahaging ginampanan ng kolonyalismong Espanyol at pandaigdigang koteksto ng reporma sa pag- usbong ng kamalayang pambansa patungo sa pagkabuo ng Pilipinas bilang isang nasyon.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment. These episodes also discuss about weather disturbances and their effects, the phases of the Moon and the beliefs and practices, associated with it, and the constellations and the information derived from their location in the sky.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang mga akda ayon sa mga tauhan, kaisipan, at saloobin na nakapaloob dito. Tatalakayin din ang pagsusulat ng sariling pananaw at ideya tungkol sa napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the key concepts, uses, and importance of statistics, data collection/gathering and the different forms of data representation, measures of central tendency, measures of variability, and probability.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach writing and composing essays. These also feature Philippine literature and theater.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagtugon ng mga Asyano sa mga hamon ng pagbabago, pag-unlad at pagpapatuloy ng Silangan at Timog-Silangang Asya sa Transisyonal at Makabagong Panahon (ika-16 hanggang ika-20 Siglo).

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the relation of geographical location of the Philippines to its environment, the different phenomena that occur in the atmosphere, the relationship of the seasons and the position of the Sun in the sky, and the occurrence of eclipses.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng iba't ibang akda na may kaugnayan sa kulturang Asyano batay sa mga elemento nito. Ipapaliwanag din dito kung paano maglahad at maghambing ng mga pananaw.

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the basic concepts of trigonometry.

programme.title: Grade 9 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the relevance worth of ideas, soundness of author’s reasoning, and the effectiveness of a presentation. These also explain critical issues that demand sound analysis and call for prompt actions.

programme.title: Grade 9 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sektor ng ekonomiya at mga patakarang pang- ekonomiya nito sa harap ng mga hamon at pwersa tungo sa pambansang pagsulong at pag-unlad.

programme.title: Grade 9 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the projectile motion, impulse and momentum, and conservation of linear momentum, conservation of mechanical energy, the relationship among heat, work, and efficiency. These episodes also talk about generation, transmission, and distribution of electrical energy from power plants to home.

programme.title: Extracurricular
programme.desc: These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

programme.title: ONIWABAN Ninja to Keep the Peace
programme.desc: The Edo period may have been a time of peace, but that doesn't mean the role of the ninja ended. Rather, a new type known as the Oniwaban emerged and served the shogun much like modern-day spies.

programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Converge vs Rain or Shine 49th PBA Commissioner's Cup Game 85 Feb 7
programme.desc: Converge vs Rain or Shine 49th PBA Commissioner's Cup Game 85 Feb 7.

programme.title: Hello, Universe!
programme.desc: Ariel (Janno Gibbs), a middle-aged man full of regrets, gets another chance to rewrite his past when he meets a magical figure who gives him the life he has always dreamt of. But at what cost?

programme.title: Abay Babes
programme.desc: It tells the story of five girls who have been best friends since high school and are reunited for a wedding of the least attractive person in their group.

programme.title: Talahib At Rosas 2
programme.desc: Nestor and Juliet used to be friends, but now, they belong to two warring camps. Soon, they find themselves battling a common enemy--a greedy businessman desperate to grab the lands of the poor.

programme.title: Through Night and Day
programme.desc: Ben and Jen's relationship is put to test as they embark on a trip of a lifetime to Jen's lifelong dream destination - Iceland.

programme.title: Ang Huling Henya
programme.desc: Miri is trapped in her past and this time her whole past comes crashing back into her life: old dead secrets, her dead parents, and even the walking dead. Miris return to Manila only brings her back to more trouble the personal kind.

programme.title: Girl Boy Bakla Tomboy
programme.desc: The quadruplets are united again when one of them needs a liver transplant but resentment due to their separation threatens their reunion.

programme.title: Ikaw at Ako at Ang Ending
programme.desc: When a bagman meets a hotelkeeper, he knows she's the one. To hide and start anew, they go to the northernmost part of the country where an unexpected end awaits them.

programme.title: Ang Lahat Ng Ito'y Para Sa'yo
programme.desc: She's a young woman pampered by wealth. He's a young man battered by poverty. But for them, their disparate social backgrounds are insignificant. This is a heart-warming drama about human frailties and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: Ilusyon
programme.desc: Set in 1958, Ilusyon tells the story of Miguel, a young man from the countryside who decides to visit his father, Pablo, a Modernist painter in Manila. Upon his arrival, he discovers that his father has decided to leave for the province to heal from depression after the recent death of his wife and Miguel’s mother.

programme.title: Batas Ko Ang Uusig
programme.desc: After surviving an ambush set up by scalawag cops, Cain (Jestoni Alarcon) and his family flee to the province for him to avoid arrest. But despite the change in environment, problem continues to hound him when he unintentionally witnesses an illegal operation of a drug syndicate.

programme.title: Won't Last A Day Without You
programme.desc: DJ Heidee (Sarah Geronimo) provides love advice to people who are having problems in their relationships. In the process of getting Melissa and Andrew together, Heidee begin to feel an attraction toward Andrew.

programme.title: Elemento
programme.desc: The story is about Cristine (Kara) and her struggle when her son Lucas (Albert Silos) returned from school field trip, with a different soul.

programme.title: 100 Tula Para Kay Stella
programme.desc: Throughout his four years in college, Fidel, a stuttering student, tries to finish 100 poems dedicated to Stella, an aspiring but frustrated rock star, to win her heart.

programme.title: Fantastica
programme.desc: The proprietor of a struggling carnival must help a prince from another land find three lost princesses.

programme.title: Pakboys Takusa
programme.desc: Four playboy husbands sneak out to be with other women. But when one of them dates a girlfriend of a mafia boss, their lives are put at stake.

programme.title: Laruang Buhay
programme.desc: Paulo (Raul Zaragoza) is a policeman with a special mission: to find his missing brother. In search for the sibling who rebelled against him, Paulo finds himself in a far-flung town where the mayor is king and the people are timid subjects.

programme.title: Fangirl Fanboy
programme.desc: It tells the story of a wannabe actor and a talented teleserye dubber who agrees to help him improve his acting. Her coaching helps him achieve his dream of becoming a star only to find herself heartbroken when he becomes successful.

programme.title: Sons of Nanay Sabel
programme.desc: After she was accused of being a negligent mother, Sabel's (Ai-ai delas Alas) wedding to Prince Harry was cancelled. To make things right, she embarks on a journey to find her estranged sons and reunite her family.

programme.title: The Ship Show (Let Love Sail)
programme.desc: Twelve people are paired into two to compete in a reality show and be the country's next big love team.

programme.title: Ang Manghuhula
programme.desc: Messina (Eula Valdez), an outcast and failed fortuneteller returns to her hometown to save her daughter Claire (Glaiza de Castro) from a syndicate that aims to exploit her gift of fortune telling.

programme.title: Bekikang
programme.desc: Bekikang is left and abandoned with a baby boy by friend, Fortunato. He loves and raises the child as his own flesh and blood.

programme.title: Miss.. Gabi Na
programme.desc: At a young age, Adora (Ynez Veneracion) lost his father to a freak vehicular accident. The early demise of their father creates a strong bond between her siblings, but the time comes when she loses her sister to a group of spoiled, drug-crazed men.

programme.title: Nilalang
programme.desc: Nilalang tackles the underbelly of corrupt Philippine cops with the Japanese 'Yakuza' and its links to a centuries' old curse that may be responsible for the spate of serial killings happening in Manila.

programme.title: Bilibid Or Nut
programme.desc: Sixto (Niño Muhlach) has always been the jealous type, the kind of guy who launches a verbal assault every time he sees his girlfriend to any other man. But one day, after a rather scandalous fit of jealousy, something terrible happens and he is accused of killing her.

programme.title: Ika-13 Kapitulo
programme.desc: The birth of Angela (Anne Curtis) brings tremendous joy to the couple David (Christopher de Leon) and Sara (ZsaZsa Padilla). Angela would complete their union and makes them a complete family.

programme.title: Ang Babaeng Walang Pakiramdam
programme.desc: A woman diagnosed with a rare congenital disease that makes her incapable of feeling physical and emotional pain meets a man with cleft palate who makes her feel love like she never has before.

programme.title: Never Not Love You
programme.desc: It tells the story of young lovers who tries to build a life together until career opportunities sends them to a different country where their relationship will be tested.

programme.title: Ang Panday
programme.desc: A young blacksmith realizes his destiny when a malevolent demon bent on ruling the world unleashes an army of creatures on humanity.

programme.title: Masamang Ugat
programme.desc: Two brothers are separated after their mother dies. One becomes a cop (Mikey Arroyo), the other an assassin (Ace Vergel). The cop ambitiously wants to bring down a drug lord supported by politicians, while the assassin works for the same drug lord.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Adarna Gang
programme.desc: Seeking justice, Adriana (Coleen Garcia) vows to take revenge on the family that killed her father - her target: the patriarch and his three sons Juan (JC Santos), Diego (Diego Loyzaga) and Pedro (Mark Anthony Fernandez).

programme.title: Kailangan Ko'y Ikaw
programme.desc: Francine Natra (Regine Velasquez) and Gimo Talumpati (Robin Padilla) crossed paths when Gimo won the \"Date With A Star\" contest thus taking the popular Francine on a special date. But their fairytale love story struggled when the relationship went public.

programme.title: Ang Pambansang Third Wheel
programme.desc: Trina has lived her whole life as a third wheel. Will Trina ever break free from being a third or fourth wheel and finally find happiness as the Only One?

programme.title: Reyna
programme.desc: Ginnieffer Balisteros, a sad,insecure and desperate woman who feels the need to win a beauty pageant to prove her self-worth.

programme.title: Tatarin
programme.desc: An adaptation of the popular play of Nick Joaquin,Tatarin tackles the celebration of a sacred feast that liberates.

programme.title: Basta Ikaw... Nanginginig Pa
programme.desc: Enteng (Vic Sotto) has long been looking for the right girl, it seems that he doesn’t have much luck at it. Disappointed, he decides to join his cousin in Manila where he meets Selya (Rosanna Roces), his cousin’s landlady.

programme.title: Shoot! Shoot! Di Ko Siya Titigilan!
programme.desc: When an aspiring actor practices his role as a billionaire out loud, gossip about him being rich spreads like wildfire. Now, the girls and the goons are after him.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Adarna Gang
programme.desc: Seeking justice, Adriana (Coleen Garcia) vows to take revenge on the family that killed her father - her target: the patriarch and his three sons Juan (JC Santos), Diego (Diego Loyzaga) and Pedro (Mark Anthony Fernandez).

programme.title: The Breakup Playlist
programme.desc: A story about an aspiring professional singer and a rock singer who collaborates in a song. As they work on their song, they start to develop feelings for each other.

programme.title: Kita Kita
programme.desc: A film about a working Filipino woman working as travel guide in Sapporo, Japan who was driven to blindness due to extreme stress and heartache. While living alone, she found comfort in the company of a fellow Filipino whom served as her eyes during her times of temporary blindness.

programme.title: Hanggang Kailan?
programme.desc: Kath (Louise de los Reyes) and Donnie (Xian Lim) are celebrating their 2nd year anniversary in Japan and decides to end their relationship when the trip ends.

programme.title: Manila's Finest
programme.desc: Manila's Finest is inspired and based on the life and career of retired Western Police District (WPD) Col. Jimmy Tiu, who last served as the Sta. Mesa police station commander of WPD.

programme.title: Donsol
programme.desc: In this film, Donsol is a place of refuge for the butanding but also a holding pen for lost and lonely people who wish for things they are no longer likely to get. Will Daniel and Teresa's newfound bond be strong or will it be blown along with the amihan wind which signals the end of the butanding migratory visit to the small town?

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: Half-sisters Aileen and Romina, along with first cousins Ruth and Sandra, reunite in Camiguin to bury their grandmother. Accompanied by Sandra’s friend, Lucy, the five girls dare to call on the spirits of the dead when they find their old Ouija board from when they were kids.

programme.title: Bugbog Sarado
programme.desc: Bugbog Sarado is a mystery drama revolving around two neighboring couples. More than a vicious plot of deceit and family trouble, this is a story of sodomy and masochism starring the country’s leading sexy stars.

programme.title: Salat Sa Ligaya
programme.desc: A story of a typical, provincial life involving two sisters, desire to seek for inner contentment and aiming for a better living.

programme.title: Manoy: Isang Pagsaludo Kay Eddie Garcia
programme.desc: Icons of Philippine entertainment industry pay tribute to the “Manoy” of Philippine Cinema Eddie Garcia in this documentary helmed by internationally-acclaimed director, Jon Red.

programme.title: Ang Huling Henya
programme.desc: Miri is trapped in her past and this time her whole past comes crashing back into her life: old dead secrets, her dead parents, and even the walking dead. Miris return to Manila only brings her back to more trouble the personal kind.

programme.title: Strebel, Gestapo ng Maynila
programme.desc: The era when Western Police District was truly, Manila’s Finest. Major Robert Strebel is a policeman whose strongest trait is his strong sense of duty. A law enforcer who is willing to take the extra length to get his responsibilities done.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses and his team of hapless heroes return for another risky mission - this time tasked with finding a dangerous nuclear weapon. The team embark on a perilous journey to Europe pursued by deadly terrorists and government officials.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return
programme.desc: A retired soldier takes on a military supercomputer that has run amok.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Will and Jake Grimm are travelling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires genuine courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: In the 25th century, a virus has decimated mankind. Political conflicts, though, have taken their toll. Into this setting, acrobatic assassin Aeon Flux makes a dangerous trek to take out the government's top leader.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return
programme.desc: A retired soldier takes on a military supercomputer that has run amok.

programme.title: Iron Man: Rise Of Technovore
programme.desc: When a young terrorist named Ezekiel Stane attacks Starks Industries with a lethal biotechnology that threatens to destroy the world, it is up to IRON MAN to hunt down Stane and his bio-enhanced monsters known as Technovores.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle For The Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: The Water Horse
programme.desc: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: Britt Reid is a rich, spoiled playboy who has been happy to maintain a direction-less existence. When his father James Reid dies, Britt meets an impressive and resourceful company employee, Kato.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

programme.desc: Considered the most beautiful debutante of the 1930s, heiress Margaret Sweeny (Claire Foy) is in the midst of a divorce when she meets the dashing - and married - Ian Campbell, future Duke of Argyll (Paul Bettany).

programme.title: A Very British Scandal
programme.desc: Putting aside gnawing doubts about her marriage, Margaret continues with her plan to secure her claim to Inveraray Castle.

programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two survivors of a bus crash awake to discover that they are the only people left in the town, they must work together to unveil the truth behind their isolation. As terrifying events unfold, nothing really is as it seems….

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: Elemento
programme.desc: A mother experiences strange and terrifying events after her son returns from a field trip to the forest. She later discovers that a mysterious power has changed her son’s behavior and must resort to supernatural ways to save her son and herself.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes….

programme.title: On Halloween
programme.desc: A journalist investigates the truth behind a series of brutal deaths and mysterious disappearances. They all lead back to an urban legend about a creepy clown that has stalked the woods of a park for over a hundred years, where horrific events keep happening.

programme.title: Japanese Doll of Terror
programme.desc: University student Yuri and her childhood friend Masato both receive a peculiar invitation to a campsite party. Along with the five young people and an older man who are also invited, they drive to the campsite but are stalked by an eerie Japanese doll. As the doll grows bigger, things turn deadlier...

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

Along with the five young people and an older man who are also invited, they drive to the campsite but are stalked by an eerie Japanese doll. As the doll grows bigger, things turn deadlier...

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Ruin Me
programme.desc: Six strangers sign up for “Slasher Sleepout”, a horror movie experience in which participants are dropped into a forest and pursued by knife-wielding assassins. When the participants begin to die one after the other, Alexandra, who has never seen a horror film before, must unravel the mysteries in order to survive the ordeal.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Babang Luksa
programme.desc: One year after Carlos’ girlfriend Beatrice died, his new love Anna starts to experience horrifying events. Through a spiritualist, Anna knows that she is the reason for Beatrice’s suicide, which leads to the return of her angry spirit to seek revenge. As Anna’s friends begin to die mysteriously one by one, will she be the next victim?

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events….

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) move into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Living Space
programme.desc: When a young couple discovers that their lodge is haunted by the ghost of a Nazi SS officer, their romantic holiday in Germany turns into a nightmare.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death….

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Central Park
programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret….

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam, meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: Welcome To Waikiki 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Actor Lee Joon-ki ropes two longtime friends into investing in the Seoul guesthouse he runs on the side, where their old crush from school comes to stay.

programme.title: Missing You
programme.desc: When Hee-Joo was 7 years old, her father was murdered. The killer, Ki-Bum, was eventually arrested. Hee-Joo has waited patiently for Ki-Bum's release.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.

programme.title: Behind The Shadows
programme.desc: Yun-ho, born weak and destined to die young, is drawn to his loyal friend, Jae-un. In the conservative Joseon Dynasty, Yun-ho disguises as a girl to confess his love to Jae-un before his arranged marriage.

programme.title: The Fatal Encounter
programme.desc: King Jeongjo is under threat by the opposing Nowon and Soron factions and struggles to protect his throne. He faces opposition from every direction and becomes the target of assassination.

programme.title: Single In Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: The investigation following a sales manager brutally killing his entire family leads to a track of mystery and tragedy in an overwhelmed work team at Seoul.

programme.title: Love 911
programme.desc: A doctor tries to woo a grieving, widowed firefighter in her attempt to get him to testify on her behalf in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: An evil spirit that changes faces infiltrates a family, placing one brother in danger while the other tries to save him.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Miss Fortune
programme.desc: Swindler Jihye is looking to make her last big score. Together with her daughter, they infiltrate the house of a cultural property broker who has a net worth of 60 billion won.

programme.title: Will You Be There?
programme.desc: A surgeon’s dying wish is to see his lover who had died in an accident long ago. He receives pills that allow him to travel back in time and tries to save her. There, he also meets his younger self.

programme.title: Cheer Up, Mr. Lee!
programme.desc: Unlike his heart-throb appearances, Mr. Lee, who has very child-like characteristics, embarks on a voyage of discovery with his young daughter ‘Saet-byeol’ whom he has just met.

programme.title: Dr. Cheon And The Lost Talisman
programme.desc: Dr. Cheon is a fake exorcist who cannot see or hear any ghosts. One day, a woman comes to Dr. Cheon, asking him to save her possessed younger sister...

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: Love My Scent
programme.desc: An ordinary man who has never known love, struggles to talk to his crush who goes to work on the same bus as him every day. Things started to change when he acquires a strange perfume that has the power to attract women...

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: Canola
programme.desc: Gye-choon and her lost grandaughter Hye-ji reunited after 12 years, yet Hye-ji's strange behaviour raise questions on what happened to her while they were apart.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: Welcome To Waikiki 2 Ep7
programme.desc: Actor Lee Joon-ki ropes two longtime friends into investing in the Seoul guesthouse he runs on the side, where their old crush from school comes to stay.

programme.title: Welcome To Waikiki 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Actor Lee Joon-ki ropes two longtime friends into investing in the Seoul guesthouse he runs on the side, where their old crush from school comes to stay.

programme.title: Code Name: Jackal
programme.desc: A not so smart female killer is hired to kill a popular singer. The killer then kidnaps the popular singer and tries to kill him in a bold manner which the customer requested, but the police arrive and all plans goes wrong!

programme.title: Where Would You Like To Go?
programme.desc: A tragic accident claims the lives of a teacher. His widow seeks solace in a trip to Warsaw, where an unexpected reunion and a letter bring hope to her journey of healing and rediscovery.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Canola
programme.desc: Gye-choon and her lost grandaughter Hye-ji reunited after 12 years, yet Hye-ji's strange behaviour raise questions on what happened to her while they were apart.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: Because I Love You
programme.desc: After an accident, a talented songwriter transforms into a messenger of love by connecting people who having trouble finding love and expressing their feelings.

programme.title: Noryang: Deadly Sea
programme.desc: In the last battle of Yi Sun-Sin in 1598, he fought against the Japanese army and intertwined with the Ming dynasty, bringing the 7-year Japanese invasions of Korea to an end...

programme.title: Single In Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Hijack 1971
programme.desc: Detonation of an explosive device causes terror in the flight and pilot Gyu-Sik loses sight in one eye. Yong-dae who hatched the hijacking plot, threatens to take the plane to North Korea.

programme.title: Hwayi: A Monster Boy
programme.desc: A boy raised by five fathers attached to the criminal world is about to discover the sinister truth about his past when he is forced to pull the trigger when he tags along with his fathers on a job.

programme.title: My Love, My Bride
programme.desc: Youngmin and Miyoung experienced struggles in their marriage soon after the honeymoon period. As they try to sort things out, they learn the true meaning of love.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: When an Olympic gold medalist boxer met a young boxer who falls victim to match fixing, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at and give his student a shot at the nationals.

programme.title: Missing You
programme.desc: When Hee-Joo was 7 years old, her father was murdered. The killer, Ki-Bum, was eventually arrested. Hee-Joo has waited patiently for Ki-Bum's release.

programme.title: Toss Coin
programme.desc: A busker met a girl who makes decision through tossing a coin.

Plus, one woman is shocked and bewildered when Michael disappears and reappears before her very eyes.

programme.desc: Georgie \u0026 Mandy's First Marriage S1 11.

Hero is a word we often hear in the world of sports, but heroism is not always about achievements on the field of play. 42 tells the story of two men -- the great Jackie Robinson (Chadwick Boseman) and the legendary Brooklyn Dodgers manager Branch Rickey (Harrison Ford) -- whose brave stand against prejudice forever changed the world by changing the game of baseball. In 1946, Rickey signed Robinson to the team, breaking Major League Baseball's infamous color line. Facing racism from every side, Robinson demonstrated tremendous courage by letting his talent on the field do the talking -- ultimately winning over fans and his teammates, and paving the way for others to follow.
